subject: Baseball
World Baseball Classic
lead_paragraph: Phillipe Aumont shattered David Wright’s bat on a popout, struck out Kevin Youkilis and Curtis Granderson swinging on curveballs, and danced off the mound.
snippet: Phillipe Aumont shattered David Wright’s bat on a popout, struck out Kevin Youkilis and Curtis Granderson swinging on curveballs, and danced off the mound.
